Chaos: The world would be thrown into chaos as people would not remember their names, addresses, or even basic life skills. There would be a lot of confusion and fear, as people would not know how to function in society.
Social collapse: Without memory, people would not be able to form relationships or maintain their social structures. This could lead to a breakdown of society and a loss of community.
Economic collapse: People would not be able to work or function in the workforce, leading to a complete collapse of the economy.
Loss of knowledge: Without memory, people would not be able to learn or retain information, leading to a loss of knowledge and progress.
Environmental collapse: Without memory, people would not be able to remember how to care for the environment, leading to a complete collapse of the ecosystem.
